skill.name: kpi-dashboard-design
skill.description: Design effective KPI dashboards with metrics selection, visualization best practices, and real-time monitoring patterns. Use when building business dashboards, selecting metrics, or designing data visualization layouts.
skill.summary: Design effective KPI dashboards with metrics selection, visualization best practices, and real-time ...
skill.author: unknown

security_audit.summary: The skill content is documentation and example snippets only. No file access, network calls, or execution logic is present.

content.user_title: Design KPI dashboards that drive decisions
content.value_statement: Many dashboards show too many metrics without clarity. This skill helps you select KPIs and design layouts that focus attention and action.
actual_capabilities: Explain KPI framework levels and update cadence
Show dashboard layout patterns for executive and operations views
Include SQL examples for MRR, retention, and CAC
List dashboard design do and do not practices
limitations: No live data connections or API calls
No automated alerting setup or monitoring configuration
Examples are illustrative and may need adaptation

use_cases.title: Define executive KPI view
use_cases.description: Select 4 to 6 headline KPIs and a summary layout for monthly leadership reviews.

use_cases.title: Standardize KPI governance
use_cases.description: Align SMART metrics and reporting cadence across departments.

use_cases.title: Build real time ops view
use_cases.description: Design a live operations dashboard with alerts and service health indicators.

prompt_templates.title: Starter KPI list
prompt_templates.scenario: New dashboard for a small SaaS team
prompt_templates.prompt: List 6 core KPIs for a SaaS executive dashboard and explain why each matters.

prompt_templates.title: Department view
prompt_templates.prompt: Create separate KPI sets for sales and marketing with update frequency and target audience.

prompt_templates.title: Layout critique
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this dashboard description and propose a clearer layout hierarchy and alert section.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced retention plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a cohort retention section with suggested visuals and key questions to answer.

output_examples.input: Create an executive KPI dashboard outline for a subscription business.
output: Headline KPIs: MRR, ARR, churn rate, NPS, active customers
Layout: top KPI cards, trend chart, product mix pie, alerts strip
Cadence: monthly executive review with weekly tactical drilldowns

best_practices: Keep KPI counts limited and aligned to business goals
Show trends and targets for context
Match update frequency to decision cadence
anti_patterns: Overcrowding the dashboard with too many charts

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the guidance is tool agnostic and works in Claude, Codex, and Claude Code prompts.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides guidance and examples but does not connect to data sources or deploy dashboards.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my BI tool?
faq.answer: It offers design patterns and KPI lists you can apply in any BI tool or custom app.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it contains only static guidance and example snippets with no data access.

faq.question: What if my KPIs do not fit the examples?
faq.answer: Adapt the framework and SMART criteria to your domain and goals.

faq.question: How does it compare to a dashboard template?
faq.answer: It provides strategy and patterns rather than a fixed template, so you can tailor the layout.
